title: The best vegetarian chilli
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon olive oil', '1/2 medium onion, chopped', '2 bay leaves', '1 teaspoon ground cumin', '2 tablespoons dried oregano', '1 tablespoon salt', '2 celery stalks, sliced', '2 fresh green peppers, chopped', '2 jalapeno chilli peppers, chopped', '3 cloves garlic, chopped', '225g chilli peppers in a jar, drained and sliced', '650g vegetarian mince', '5 (400g) tins chopped tomatoes', '2 tablespoons chilli powder', '1 tablespoon freshly ground black pepper', '1 (400g) tin kidney beans, drained', '1 (400g) tin chickpeas, drained', '1 (400g) tin black beans, drained', '1 (400g) tin sweetcorn, drained']
